experience: You and Martha both know Lance Klem, Peter Reno, and 94 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Implement mainframe security processes; perform Top Secret administrative functions; support security awareness programs;Run access reports for various departments; maintain access for retail applications (MARS, Integrated Cashiering; RepSource, etc)Provide user instruction on proper methods of requesting access.

Evaluated, tested and recommended new software systems or changes to existing packages or procedures to ensure proper compliance with security standards; instructed programmers and users regarding security standards, procedures and access requirements; maintained online access profiles of authorized users of all mainframe computer systems and subsystems using CA-Top Secret and native DB2 SQL; maintained online access profiles in OS and Windows XP; prepared and delivered security access presentations to the user community;

Evaluated, tested and recommended new software systems or changes to existing packages or procedures to ensure proper compliance with security standards; instructed programmers and users regarding security standards, procedures and access requirements; maintained online access profiles of authorized users of all computer systems and subsystems using RACF; prepared and delivered security access presentations to the user community

Analyzed the implementation of new software security packages or changes to ensure proper protection enforced; developed online computer security procedures using RACF in an MVS/ESA and VM operating environment; instructed programmers and users regarding security standards, procedures and access requirements; evaluated, tested and recommended new software systems or changes to existing packages or procedures to ensure proper compliance with security standards; prepared and delivered security awareness presentations to the user community; audited access attempts to computer resources and reported security violations; Identified and analyzed potential data integrity threats

Analyzed requirements for processing production business applications; processing schedules and determined resource and input availability for job submission; managed the coordination of resolutions for failing job streams; evaluate and recommend action plans to prevent failing job streams due to internal procedural or communication breakdowns; maintained production load module, JCL procedure, system catalogs and tape management libraries; evaluated production job steam documentation for accuracy and feasibility; advised and influenced programmers to provide adequate and correct documentation; documented procedures; trained new personnel

Participated in Operational Readiness Reviews; wrote, reviewed and analyzed production job steam documentation for accuracy and feasibility; established system identifiers for new systems to ensure system integrity; advised and influenced programmers to provide complete and correct documentation; attened Operational Readiness Reviews prior to the implementation of a new system; wrote group status reports and helped coordinate other analysts' projectsMonitored job streams in process and corrected streams to successful completion; resolved end-users’ processing problems by coordinating with DP Operations and support personnel; analyzed  SYSOUT JCL errors and abends

Coordinated project assignments for the staff; served as editor and publisher of Chamber newsletter; planned, organized and supervised Chamber events; attended Chamber Board meetings and acted as secretary for these meetings; received, recorded and deposited Chamber monies; acted as bookkeeper and receptionist
Research project for Scholarships and grants available to students; maintained library of annual reports; President's List
Research project for Scholarships and grants available to students; maintained library of annual reports; President's List
Grassroots environmental group at El Camino Community College; primary activity clean-up of beaches, parks and open spaces

Working with Martha Johnson at Charles Schwab, at first, seemed intimidating.  Martha knows so much about mainframe security and administering access, proprietary Schwab applications, information security best practices, etcetera.  It wasn’t long before Martha was training me on areas I was far from familiar with.  As I worked more closely with her, I realized she is not intimidating at all; she is simply well-versed in her field and happy to share knowledge with others on her team.  After I acquired additional skills from working with Martha, I shared some of my administrative abilities, ones Martha had not been exposed to prior, and she was a sponge for knowledge.  We continued working and learning together for a few years before I moved on.  Martha Johnson is someone I not only respect for her knowledge and tutelage, but also for her loyalty to both the company and team she works with.  I’m simply proud to have worked with and know her.
Dan LoPresto CIPM, CIPT, CISSP, CFE, SANS GCIH

I worked with Joe for nearly 10 years at Schwab.  He served as the delegate for a number of applications (OMNI, New Accounts, etc) and was always extremely helpful and knowledgeable.  He could always explain things we in Security weren't quite familiar with, knew who should and shouldn't have particular access and could generally point the person to the application/transactions they actually *did* need.  Joe was a tremendous asset to Schwab and would be the same to anyone lucky enough to employee him.
